Article.ArticleTitle: I Want to Row Across the Atlantic. But You Have Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis!

Abstract.AbstractText: We describe an individual with slowly progressive amyotrophic lateral sclerosis who decided to enter the Talisker Whisky Atlantic Challenge, a rowing event across the Atlantic Ocean, and completes it in 51 days in a 5-man boat.
